sorryString:
Couldn't process your request, sorry. 
 Incorrect command :
_comment: accessToken is automatically generated by the vk.com api
_comment2: Waitperiod is the number of seconds in between message re-checks
_comment3: If you set autoStart to False, it will expect you to run the trollabot.start() method manually
